attributes.action: Provide Grants and Support To Help People to Convert to LPG
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: due to HIGH inflation, High intrest rates and over priced fuel. people are strugling to carry out every day Tasks such as using their cars. If help is given to people to convert to LPG, first it is better for the enviroment and second people can save the extra money for retirement and raise their standard of living.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
